data.title: Currency in Mauritius - Mauritian Rupie - MUR
data.meta_description: See the current exchange rate for Mauritian Rupie MUR. Use the currency converter for SEK to MUR and exchange the currency MUR - Mauritian Rupie at FOREX.
data.text:
MUR â€“ the currency in Mauritius

Are you traveling to Mauritius and need Mauritian Rupie (MUR)? At FOREX, you can easily buy MUR for your trip. We offer both online purchases and personal service in our stores.

When you buy MUR online, you can choose to have your currency delivered to the nearest postal agent or pick it up at any of our stores. Our goal is to make your Mauritian Rupie order simple and hassle-free.

With the currency converter, you can calculate MUR to SEK and stay fully informed about the current exchange rate. The currency graph shows the historical development of Mauritian Rupie against your local currency over time. You can choose a timeframe from 2012 up to today.
